summary: This is an email from July 8, 2019, providing a status update on Jeffrey Epstein's legal proceedings. It states that Epstein pled not guilty and is being detained pending a bail hearing scheduled for that Thursday. The email appears to be from an FBI Special Agent in the New York office's Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking squad.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the status update; he pled not guilty and is being detained pending a bail hearing.

events.title: Epstein Pleads Not Guilty
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein entered a plea of not guilty in his criminal case.

events.title: Scheduled Bail Hearing
events.description: A bail hearing for Jeffrey Epstein was scheduled for the Thursday following July 8, 2019.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein pled not guilty to charges as of July 8, 2019.
Epstein was being detained pending a bail hearing scheduled for that Thursday (July 11, 2019).
The communication originated from or involved the FBI New York office's Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking squad (C-20).
The document is an email dated July 8, 2019, providing a status update on Epstein's case.
